WorkItem.Description: There are a lot of folder and files that need to be placed in the correct locations. It's a fair amount of work to install manually when a new version comes along. Would be great if there were a way to automate this process.

Comments.Message:
Two things to mentions:

1) MVVM Light V3 is available in NuGet, which provides a convenient way to add the MVVM Light DLLs libraries to an existing project, as well as ad a ViewModelLocator, a MainViewModel (which can be deleted if needed). 
2) We are working on an installer and are committed to have one for V4.

Thanks,
Laurent
